definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: worm, scarlet stuff (dyed with the coccus ilicis, v. [[שָׁנִי]] Thatcher:Hast. DB COLOURS);—
worm, only pl. [[תּוֹלָעִים]] in stale manna Ex 16:20 (P).
scarlet stuff, abs. sg. [[תּוֹלָ]] Is 1:18 (in sim ‖[[שָׁנִים ]]; opp. [[חֶמֶר]]); token of luxury La 4:5.
